channel.title: How can I edit PK Points to buy customs?
channel.description: Okay, so I'm running my server on StabbingScape Source, and I want to create a system where players would have to teleport to another map. When they are teleported there, they will have to fight an NPC, get some Urban Pointz and get to trade them in for custom items. How can I code that

Oh hey nice.
Actually, I want it to be Urban Pointz now, it’s like PK Points
